title: Daily Direction | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Daily Direction | Joel Osteen
description:
Too often we try to do things in our own strength. But we weren't meant to do life alone. God has the wisdom we need to reach our full potential. When you make time to consult Him in your daily life, you're setting yourself up for victory. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
